text:
Hey, Haruki-chan,
which pouch do you think is better?

White and pink, huh...
For Hana-chan’s usual image, maybe the white one?

Yeah, I was thinking white too,
but then I realized I already have one like it.

When you collect things based on your taste,
you end up with a bunch of similar ones, right...!

Then maybe it’s a good idea to go
with the pink one this time?

Okay, I’ll go with the pink one──!
Thanks, Haruki-chan.
